donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
THE WILLIAM AND FLORA HEWLETT FOUNDATION
outputs.output_descr:
This project will help accelerate progress towards the achievement of the MDGs by: .(i) lead coordinated effort to accelerate MDG achievement in priority countries; (ii) provide proactive guidance to UNDP in its mandate as MDG Scorekeeper; (iii) identify and disseminate policy options and choices that support planning and implementation of MDG-based national strategies and Country Programmes; and (iv) effective and coordinated support to global, regional and national advocacy to raise public awareness, support multilateral efforts and mobilize resources . The ultimate objective is to ensure that efforts in support of the MDGs are better coordinated, more effective, mutually reinforcing and responding adequately to the changing environment. The expected outputs of this project are:
 Policy advisory, capacity development and technical assistance services provided to RBx, BCPR, RCSs, Regional Hubs, UNCTs, central and local governments to support renewed actions for the MDGs with particular focus on supporting the acceleration of MDG achievement
 Knowledge products (guidance and practice notes, interagency policy briefs) on MDGs in different regional and country contexts: LLC, LDC, MIC, crisis or post-conflict countries, and countries in MDG reversals developed.
 Coordinated support (UN and Non-UN partners) for the MDGs.

AAP's Cross-Practice Initiative brings together UNDP's expertise across its core practice areas  poverty reduction, gender mainstreaming, governance, knowledge management and policy and planning  into a comprehensive suite of technical assistance that can be provided to countries. This is one of few initiatives that are actually testing crosspractice approaches on the ground and is a forerunner to a broader UNDP cross practice approach. This initiative is therefore expected to generate useful lessons that can be widely replicated to other initiatives/practice areas.

project_descr: This project will help accelerate progress towards the achievement of the MDGs
project_title: COORDINATED SUPPORT TO ACHIEVE THE MDGs
